contents.content: 第四部分 特殊规则
第三章 独立主格结构
第二节 真题分析
一、雅思阅读真题分析10例
Example 1
真题回放：Today rail freight services are facing marginalisation, with just 8% of market share, and with international goods trains struggling along at an average speed of 18km/h. （剑10阅读）

contents.title: 随着国家经济的增长和人民生活水平的提高，人们更加重视教育。
contents.answer: ：With the steady growth in the country's economy as well as the people's living standard, people attach more importance to education.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，with just 8% of market share是“with+名词+介词短语”的独立主格结构，with international goods trains struggling along at an average speed of 18km/h.是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 2
真题回放：In addition, a major collection like that of London's National Gallery is housed in numerous rooms, each with dozens of works. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，each with dozens of works是“代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 3
真题回放：Constructed in around 1700, it is nine storeys deep, with the last two being underwater. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with the last two being underwater是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 4

真题回放：Recently, however, it has been experiencing something of a renaissance, with renewed demand for original Bakelite（酚醛树脂）objects in the collectors' marketplace, and museums, societies and dedicated individuals once again appreciating the style and originality of this innovative material.
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with renewed demand for original Bakelite objects in the
collectors' marketplace是“with+名词+介词短语”的独立主格结构，museums, societies and dedicated individuals once again appreciating the style and originality of this innovative material是“名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 5
真题回放：A lot of their work comes down to measurement—everything from the exact angle of a swimmer's dive to the second-by-second power output of a cyclist. （剑6阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，everything from…to…是“代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 6
真题回放：Coal's total contribution to greenhouse gas emissions is thought to be about 18 per cent, with about half of this coming from electricity generation. （剑3阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with about half of this coming from electricity generation是“with+
名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 7
真题回放：And with a few Echinacea plants nearby, you'll never go short of a cure. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with a few Echinacea plants nearby是“with+名词+副词”的独立主格结构。
Example 8
真题回放：Some work has begun already, with researchers trying to identify people who are particularly successful in autoganzfeld trials. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的with researchers trying to identify people是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构；who引导的是定语从句，修饰people。
Example 9
真题回放：With phosphorus costing the equivalent of several hundred pounds per ounce, the first matches were expensive.
语法破解：这是一个简单句，With phosphorus costing the equivalent of several hundred pounds per ounce是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 10
真题回放：The first region to have something approximating today's ATC was New York City, with other major metropolitan areas following soon after. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with other major metropolitan areas following soon after是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
二、雅思听力真题分析10例
Example 1
真题回放：Older children continue to benefit from a wide range of tuition, anything from trampolining to yoga. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，anything from trampolining to yoga是“代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 2
真题回放：I'm sure a really significant development will be a major increase in competition, with companies from all round the world trying to sell similar products. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，sure后面是省略了引导词that的宾语从句，with companies from all round the world trying to sell similar products是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 3
真题回放：The unique design is based on the concept of the Global Village, with the playground being divided into six areas showing different parts of the world—each with a representative feature. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with the playground being divided into six areas是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构，each with a representative feature是“代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 4
真题回放：It hopes soon to be able to employ its first full-time biologist—with dolphin expertise—to monitor populations. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with dolphin expertise—to monitor populations是“with+名词+不定式短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 5
真题回放：This brought about tremendous change in the environment, with the sea levels rising and creeping steadily inland. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with the sea levels rising and creeping steadily inland是“with+
名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 6
真题回放：Our sites are truly child-friendly, and, with this in mind, we operate a no-noise rule in the evenings. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句，with this in mind是“with+代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 7
真题回放：Buses depart from Central Station every five to six minutes from about 9 a.m. with the last bus at around 7 p.m. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with the last bus at around 7 p.m.是“with+名词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 8
真题回放：Basically we are organising a ten-day holiday, from the sixth to the sixteenth of November, with eight days actual walking, trekking in the Semira Mountains. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with eight days actual walking是“with+名词+现在分词”的独立主格结构。
Example 9
真题回放：Now, with that in mind, do you have any special diet, anything we should know about （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的with that in mind是“with+代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构；we should know about是省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰anything。
Example 10
真题回放：As you can see, there's a lake in the north west of the park, with a bird hide to the west of it, at the end of a path. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。As引导的是非限制性定语从句，主句中的with a bird hide to the west of it是“with+名词+介词短语”的独立主格结构，这里的hide是名词，意思是（观看野生动物的）隐蔽处。
三、雅思写作和口语中的独立主格结构
在雅思写作和口语中，独立主格也是很重要的加分结构。
下面我们就举例讲解独立主格结构的具体应用。
点评：这是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句，其中的With the average temperature continuously rising是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。该句常用于写作、口语的“环境类”话题中。
点评：这是一个主从复合句。believe后面是省略了引导词that的宾语从句，with the range of technology available to people是“with+名词+形容词短语”的独立主格结构。该句常用于写作、口语的“科技类和社会类”话题中。
点评：这是一个简单句，With the incidence of driving offenses hovering at high levels是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。该句常用于写作、口语的“交通类”话题中。
点评：这是一个简单句，with people standing on both sides是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。该句常用于写作中，引出双方的观点。
点评：这是一个简单句，With the steady growth in the country's economy as well as the people's living standard是“with+名词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。该句常用于写作、口语的“教育类”话题中。
